result.execSummary:
The defendant Troy L. Cummings was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must report to probation today. 87 days sentence credit.
Concurrent with: With any prison sentences in Minnesota

miscConds.notes: Must provide DNA sample and pay the $250.00 DNA surcharge to the COCC. DNA surcharge to be taken out of bond and any other fines that defendant owes to Polk County. Balance of bond to be refunded.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.
No voting and no holding public office.
